Plot: The 2007 LG Action Sports World Championships is the season-ending championships for Freestyle Motocross, Skateboarding, BMX, and Inline Skating. The event serves as the "Super Bowl" for the booming world of action sports.
Title: 2007 LG Action Sports World Championships
Actors: Brian Aragon, Jamie Bestwick, Bob Burnquist, Fabiola Da Silva
